General.Name: EV Advanced Material Co.Ltd
General.Description: EV Advanced Material Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells flexible printed circuit boards (FPCBs). It offers FPCBs for electronic devices and products, and medical defense, as well as transparent display products. The company was formerly known as ACT Co., Ltd. EV Advanced Material Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

2.Name: Seok-Joon  Hwang
2.Title: Director of Sales Division and Director
